text: Rimberg is a locality in the municipality Schmallenberg in the district Hochsauerlandkreis in North Rhine-Westphalia, Germany. The hamlet has 7 inhabitantsSchmallenberg.de: Inhabitants and lies in the north of the municipality of Schmallenberg at a height of around 610 m. Rimberg borders on the villages of Sonderhof and Bad Fredeburg. == Gallery == File:Hotel_Knoche_2014.JPG|Hotel Rimberg File:Rimberg 2.JPG|House No. 2 File:Rimberg 3.jpg|House No. 3 ==References== Category:Villages in North Rhine-Westphalia Category:Schmallenberg
title: Rimberg
